title: INCREDIBLE 3 BEDROOMS NEWLY RENOVATED!! APPLY NOW
map_address: 3301 Civic Center Dr Unit 3B near Cheyenne and Civic Center
posting_body: The Landing at Civic Center, located in the upcoming North Side of Vegas!
We are in the process of some wonderful upgrades to the property as well as the apartments themselves.
We are within a minute of the Las Vegas Freeway.
We also have a bus stop right outside of the community giving easy access to public transportation, with all local dining, shopping and banking within walking distance.
Our beautiful floor plans are spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms are completely renovated: new flooring; new appliances, upgraded new fixtures throughout the entire home.
We also have some amazing plans for our future amenities….
We look forward to hearing back from you.
Our office hours are Monday thru Friday, 8:00am until 5pm.
